name: Mattermost bridge for Matrix
description: This plugin provides a bridge connecting Mattermost and Matrix servers.

Application Service token for creating ghost users (required for proper user attribution). Copy this token to your Matrix homeserver registration file as 'as_token'.
settings.regenerate_help_text: Generate a new secure token (remember to update your Matrix homeserver registration file)

settings.help_text: Homeserver token for Matrix Application Service registration. Copy this token to your Matrix homeserver registration file as 'hs_token'.
settings.regenerate_help_text: Generate a new secure token (remember to update your Matrix homeserver registration file)

settings.help_text: Enable syncing messages from Mattermost to Matrix
Controls how aggressively the bridge sends requests to your Matrix server to prevent rate limiting.

options.display_name: Disabled - No rate limiting (maximum performance, risk of 429 errors)
Relaxed - Light throttling (fast, suitable for dedicated Matrix servers)
Automatic - Balanced throttling (good performance with safety) [Recommended]
Conservative - Heavy throttling (safest, matches Synapse defaults exactly)
Restricted - Maximum throttling (slowest, for shared/limited Matrix servers)

settings.help_text:
Download the registration file for your Matrix homeserver.
 
**Setup Instructions:**
1. Download the file using the button above
2. Copy it to your Matrix homeserver
3. Add the file path to your homeserver.yaml under 'app_service_config_files'
4. Restart your Matrix homeserver

See the [Matrix Application Service spec](https://spec.matrix.org/v1.14/application-service-api/) for details.
